meanings.definition: A unit of mass equal to one-tenth of a gram.
meanings.sent1: She measured the flour for the recipe using a decigram.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist weighed the medication in decigrams.
meanings.sent3: The decigram jumped off the scale and rolled away, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: His love for cooking weighed a decigram in his heart, always present.
meanings.sent5: The decigram felt light as a feather, yet held significant value in the experiment.

meanings.definition: A decigram is equivalent to 0.1 grams.
meanings.sent1: The jewelry was so delicate, each piece weighed less than a decigram.
meanings.sent2: The sugar packet contained exactly one decigram of sugar.
meanings.sent3: The decigram and the gram had a friendly competition on the scale.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was as precise as a decigram, never wavering.
meanings.sent5: The decigram marked the fine line between too much and too little in the measurement.
